Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 1.0.2.842 Windows 7

What Happens: Crash to Desktop while controlling probe descending through Kerbin's atmosphere.

Save Folder for Replication: Link

Directions::

1: Select the craft 'Interplanetary Probe 1'

2. Take control of craft.

3. Discharge the fuel tanks and RCS tanks via staging.

4. Guide ship down to ~8300m

5. if craft is destroyed on loading up, use the quicksave.

Crash Log : Link
Notentirely sure, but it might be a memory leak. There is a huge memory leak once the heat warnings pop up that can crash very quickly.

Notentirely sure, but it might be a memory leak. There is a huge memory leak once the heat warnings pop up that can crash very quickly.

Ahh, that may explain it. I was getting heat warnings on two of the parts. Thanks for the info!
There is a sticky thread in the sub-forum that describes this issue. Turning the overheat temperature gauges off with F10 should stop it happening.
